alert.note: Alert for Seminole (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 22 at 3:19PM EDT until June 22 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM EDT FOR SEMINOLE...NORTHWESTERN BREVARD...SOUTHEASTERN ORANGE AND SOUTH CENTRAL VOLUSIA COUNTIES... At 319 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Chuluota, moving northeast at 35 mph. The storm earlier produced a gust of 58 mph at Orlando Executive Airport. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Deltona, Sanford, Altamonte Springs, Oviedo and Winter Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
